name: Majority Gives
description:
Majority Gives is a Third Person Isometric Zombie Shoot'em up with Twitch Integration! That's right, just type your channel's name into the game and prepare for endless waves of zombies, power-ups and item drops!

Don't want to play alone? Plug in some controllers so you and up to 3 other friends can play together locally on one screen! Now that's a lot of mayhem! With loads of different characters to play as, what are you waiting for?!

Get Giving! - Get Majority Giving!!

Created for the 'Yogscast Jingle Jam Game Jam 2019' 

Created in collaboration with @ImStillLeo.

The game is designed with Twitch Integration.
